data.eml:eml: A new species of Leodice from Korean waters (Annelida, Polychaeta, Eunicidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Choi, Hyun Ki, Kim, Jong Guk, Kang, Dong Won, Yoon, Seong Myeong (2017): A new species of Leodice from Korean waters (Annelida, Polychaeta, Eunicidae). ZooKeys 715: 53-67, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.715.20448, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.715.20448
